verses.roman:
aneka-lokera vāñchā--aneka-prakāra
kṛpāte karila aneka-nāmera pracāra

synonyms: aneka-lokera—of many persons; vāñchā—the desires; aneka-prakāra—of many varieties; kṛpāte—by Your mercy; karila—You have done; aneka—various; nāmera—of the holy names; pracāra—broadcasting.
translation: "Because people vary in their desires, You have distributed various holy names by Your mercy.
